title: Lucien Gaudin Recipe
full_text:
Lucien Gaudin Recipe
Close

Prep

3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
gin
1/2
ounce
Campari
1/2
ounce
Cointreau
1/2
ounce
dry vermouth
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. A twist of orange peel is not out of place here.
Special equipment
Cocktail strainer and mixing glass
Gin
